metadata.description:
The release will consist of a single Dynamic Open Edition that will open for purchase at 6:30 PM ET on Friday March 31st and close at 6:30 PM ET Saturday April 1st.

Within 24 hours from the end of the Open Edition closing, the placeholder image will update to randomly reveal one of three artworks by the three featured artists: Ilya Shkipin, Reuss, and Daniel Martin.

If you purchase three editions during the primary sale each of those three editions are guaranteed to reveal a different artwork (i.e. a full set) when the placeholder images are updated. Image reveals for all other collectors will be completely random.

___

*Note: 3 editions have been reserved*
metadata.name: CANVAS CODE #1/32

attributes.value: The King In The Void by Ilya Shkipin
